text: Noli is a comune in the Province of Savona in the Liguria region in Italy. It is one of I Borghi pi√π belli d'Italia ("The most beautiful villages of Italy"). The Republic of Noli was an independent republic from 1193 until 1797. == Twin towns == Noli is twinned with: * Langenargen, Germany == References == Category:Settlements in Savona
title: Noli
